channel.title: Where can I download the old scar?
channel.description:
Im looking for a download link to Scar 3.11 does anyone have one possibly?
I already tried dylock.net but its only divi on there
Lol once I went to Freddy1990.com i realised that Scar 3.11 was Divi sorry guys... Thank you though
Shawrty

item.title: Where can I download the old scar?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

First one on the news fader.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can I download the old scar?

item.title: Where can I download the old scar?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

The “older version” that most people will refer to when using a dated script is 2.03

Which, thankfully, can be found at http://freddy1990.com/scar.php . Just make sure to get the ‘Scar 2.03 w/ SRL 6’. I think I remember hearing about a problem with 7. Release 6 works just fine nonetheless.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can I download the old scar?
